thread.title: The Success of "Snow White" American Experience
thread.title_full: Video: The Success of "Snow White" | Watch American Experience Online | PBS Video

author: pbs.org
title: The Success of "Snow White" American Experience
text: In its first year, "Snow White and the Seven Dwarfs" grossed $8 million -- more than any other film before it. Walt Disney was hailed as a true American original, one who had found the balance between art and commerce. "Walt Disney" premieres September 14 & 15 on PBS American Experience.
